berry-banner-title: The mobile-only HR platform connecting generations on the go.
berry-banner-description: Berry helps small businesses and their employees to communicate, organize and work effortlessly.
berry-team-paragraph-one: Invite your whole team to Berry and align where and when you work on any given day.
berry-team-paragraph-two: Never forget important dates - celebrate them together!
berry-service-title-two: With Berry, you are always present.
berry-service-one: Approve pending Time Off requests with a single tap and instantly cheer up your employees!
berry-service-two: Make all the necessary info accessible to your team and ditch the boring paperwork.
berry-service-three: Stay informed about what's going on in the company and with your colleagues.
berry-heading-paragraph-one: Berry is on its way to creating a new kind of company culture by emphasizing inclusivity and diversity of employees!
berry-heading-paragraph-two: We are tailoring Berry to the needs of modern workplaces by asking what you need from an HR app!
berry-about-box-one: Small businesses that offer hybrid and remote work models.
berry-about-box-two: Teams who appreciate tech, but value teammates.
berry-about-box-three: Companies that value employees' individuality as much as they love teamwork.
berry-signup-subtitle: Sign up for our Berry Beta!
